mapper.insert: INSERT INTO token ( id, name, text, rarity, slot, barbarian, bard, cleric, druid, fighter, wizard, monk, paladin, ranger, rogue ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{text}, #{rarity}, #{slot}, #{usableByBarbarian}, #{usableByBard}, #{usableByCleric}, #{usableByDruid}, #{usableByFighter}, #{usableByWizard}, #{usableByMonk}, #{usableByPaladin}, #{usableByRanger}, #{usableByRogue})
